author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...MELISSA EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING TO PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO THE WEEKEND...
summary: ...MELISSA EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING TO PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO THE WEEKEND... As of 11:00 PM EDT Wed Oct 22 the center of Melissa was located near 14.3, -74.6 with movement W at 2 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...MELISSA EXPECTED TO BRING HEAVY RAINS AND LIFE-THREATENING FLOODING TO PORTIONS OF HISPANIOLA AND JAMAICA INTO THE WEEKEND... title: Summary - Tropical Storm Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
